name: DIG (Victor_Ma)
description:
Introduction:

The story takes place in a distant future… where interstellar travel is popularized. 

 
You wake up in nowhere but an unknown planet.  You cannot remember anything.  Your compact spaceship, a note, and a strange instrument  — these are all that are left to you. 
 
You notice that these words were written on the note: “You’re the only one left.” You want to know why. What happened? Who are you? Why are you left here? The back of the note tells you,  That this strange machines controls space and time. Or, the gravity. Needing to know the truth, It’s time to move on.  
 Introducing Dig , a sole interstellar adventure. 

The scripts above is the beginning of the game. However, things laterly went to another direction with no expected. Now is a totally different game.

Now the game is basically - control gravity

By the way, I will appreciate if you guys play it and tell me how you feel. 

Victor_Ma

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

这是一个控制引力的游戏！

控制： 鼠标控制；

控制台的三个按钮

 - 旋钮控制角度 - 调节杆控制引力大小(左小右大) - 按钮控制发射 -         

Tips：

1. 当你进入某个星球的引力圈时，引力机器就能连接星球，并且调整它引力大小！

2. 星球的引力被减小时它会因为不高兴变绿 😫被增大时会被亚的难受变红🤯！

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
